Text: Cmon gatasalvaje....cant you at least seed this for a few hours so we can actually download it??

This version is NOT COMPLETE. Doesn't include any of the backdrop graphics. no stars, no nebulae, no earth, no gas fields. essentially it lacks any of the stuff that makes the screenshots look so nice. NUKE this garbage until we get a real complete version.
is it true?, this isnt complete?, please anyone!
Download COGENT release and forget this. The ONLY difference is this one includes soundtrack and art book, you can take those and delete the rest.
